name: @tempots/beatui

scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Use release scripts instead of direct publish'
scripts.test:all: pnpm test && pnpm storybook:ci && pnpm test:e2e
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version patch && pnpm run release:publish && pnpm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version minor && pnpm run release:publish && pnpm run release:commit
scripts.release:major: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version major && pnpm run release:publish && pnpm run release:commit
scripts.release:prerelease: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version prerelease && pnpm run release:publish:next && pnpm run release:commit
scripts.release:prepare: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.release:commit: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: release @tempots/beatui@$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" || echo "Warning: Could not commit to git. Please commit manually."
scripts.release:commit:dry: echo "Would commit with message: chore: release @tempots/beatui@$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
scripts.release:patch:no-commit: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version patch && pnpm run release:publish
scripts.release:minor:no-commit: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version minor && pnpm run release:publish
scripts.release:major:no-commit: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version major && pnpm run release:publish
scripts.release:prerelease:no-commit: pnpm run release:prepare && pnpm version prerelease && pnpm run release:publish:next

author: Franco Ponticelli <franco.ponticelli@gmail.com>
description: BeatUI - Modern TypeScript UI component library built with @tempots/dom, featuring layered CSS architecture and design tokens
